conbody.p: We used Introduction to DITA: A User Guide to the Darwin Information Typing Architecture by Jennifer Linton and Kylene Bruski to teach ourselves some of the basics of DITA. We recommend this book to others looking for a comprehensive, scenario-based approach to learning about DITA. For more information about this book, go to .
